alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 04 at 1:54PM MDT until April 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions at times. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in most areas. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Custer County Plains, the Fall River County Plains and Oglala Lakota County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Oglala Lakota
